Datasource.Parameter: ( SELECT 1 AS gid, ST_MakeEnvelope(35.4142,33.8297,35.593,33.9509) AS geom ) AS q
( SELECT gid, ST_Buffer( geom, 0.005 ) AS geom FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'LandPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT gid, ST_Buffer( geom, 0.0125 ) AS geom FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'LandPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT gid, ST_Buffer( geom, 0.025 ) AS geom FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'LandPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'LandPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'LandCoverPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'OpenSpacesPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'NeighborhoodsPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'WaterFeaturesPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM baseline WHERE layer = 'LandLine' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM baseline WHERE layer = 'WatersLine' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q

( SELECT *, CASE WHEN stylename = 'freeway' THEN 0 WHEN stylename = 'primary' THEN 1 WHEN stylename = 'secondary' THEN 2 WHEN stylename = 'tertiary' THEN 3 WHEN stylename = 'residential' THEN 4 WHEN stylename = 'pedestrian' THEN 5 END AS sort FROM baseline WHERE layer = 'RoadsLine' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ORDER BY sort DESC ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'UtilitiesLine' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'OpenSpacesPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q

( SELECT * FROM baseline WHERE layer = 'WatersLine' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'LandLine' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'NeighborhoodsPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT * FROM basepoly WHERE layer = 'BuildingsPoly' AND firstdispl <= 99999999 AND lastdispla >= 99999999 ) AS q
( SELECT 1 AS gid, ST_MakeEnvelope(35.4142,33.8297,35.593,33.9509) AS geom ) AS q
